feed.title: Track Awesome Deno Updates Daily

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on Oct 29, 2022
entry.content:
Modules / Web framework

  • hono (⭐25k) - Ultrafast web framework for Cloudflare Workers, Deno, and Bun. Fast, but not only fast.

Modules / Web utils

  • fresh_chart (⭐151) - A server-side-rendered charting library for Fresh.
  • squishy_cookies (⭐15) - Easily sign and verify cookies.

Showcases / XML

  • Fresh Showcase - The official showcase of Fresh apps.
  • Saleor Deno Merch (⭐32) - A fork of the original Deno Merch e-commerce website, rebuilt with Saleor (⭐22k).
  • The Official Showcase - The official showcase of Deno.

Tools / XML

  • denopendabot - Dependabot for Deno projects.

Integrations / XML

  • Netlify Edge Functions - Edge Functions connect the Netlify platform and workflow.
  • Supabase Edge Functions - Edge Functions are server-side TypeScript functions, distributed globally at the edge.
  • Astro - Deploy a server-side rendered Astro site to Deno Deploy.

Resources in Other Languages / Japanese

  • deno-ja - Deno Japanese User Group.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on Aug 02, 2021
entry.content:
Tools / XML

  • dvm
    • asdf-community/asdf-deno - Deno plugin for asdf
    • justjavac/dvm (⭐684) - Deno Version Manager: manage multiple active Deno versions.
    • axetroy/dvm (⭐168) - Version manger for Deno without runtime dependencies.
    • dvm.cmd (⭐2) - Deno Version Manager for Windows. Written as a single batch file.
    • ghosind/dvm (⭐49) - A lightweight Deno Version Manager for Linux/MacOS.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 31, 2021
entry.content:
Modules / Utils

  • buckets (⭐25) - Bundle assets and scripts in a single executable file.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 29, 2021
entry.content:
Modules / CLI utils

  • kia (⭐53) - Simple terminal spinners for Deno 🦕
  • terminal_images (⭐53) - A Deno module and CLI tool for displaying images in the terminal.

Modules / Database

  • denodb (⭐1.9k) - MySQL, SQLite, MariaDB, PostgreSQL and MongoDB ORM for Deno.
  • dsddb (⭐13) - A dead simple persistant key-value database utilizing the JSON format.
  • dso (⭐92) - A simple ORM library based on mysql.
  • postgres (⭐636) - Driver for PostgreSQL database.
  • sql-builder (⭐55) - An sql query builder.

Modules / Frontend development

  • postcss (⭐58) - A tool for transforming styles with JS plugins.

Modules / Frontend framework

  • aleph.js (⭐5.2k) - A React framework in Deno, inspired by Next.js.

Modules / Mail

  • deno-smtp (⭐81) - A smtp mail sender for deno.

Modules / Markdown

  • marked (⭐9) - Markdown-to-HTML converter.

Modules / String utils

  • camelcase (⭐8) - Convert a dash/dot/underscore/space separated string to camelCase: foo-bar → fooBar.
  • deno_case_style (⭐4) - String validator and formater for different case style. eg: camelCase etc.
  • deno-prettystring (⭐7) - Format, trim and remove extra white spaces between characters from string.
  • deno-slugify (⭐19) - A string slugifier for deno.
  • normalize_diacritics (⭐14) - Remove accents/diacritics in string.

Modules / Template engine

  • deno_tiny_templates (⭐6) - Template renderer for deno.
  • eta (⭐1.5k) - Fast, lightweight, and configurable embedded template engine.

Modules / Testing

  • deno-puppeteer (⭐458) - A library which provides a high-level API to control Chromium or Chrome over the DevTools Protocol.
  • expect (⭐46) - Helpers for writing jest like expect tests in deno.
  • merlin (⭐50) - Testing and Benchmarking framework for deno 🧙‍♂️
  • pretty_benching (⭐25) - A small library to make your Deno benchmarking progress and results look pretty.
  • rhum (⭐93) - A lightweight testing framework for Deno.
  • superdeno (⭐124) - Super-agent driven library for testing Deno HTTP servers.
  • superoak (⭐120) - HTTP assertions for Oak made easy via SuperDeno.
  • tincan (⭐37) - A Jest-like testing library for Deno.
  • unexpected (⭐371) - Extensible BDD assertion toolkit.

Modules / Utils

  • bytes_formater (⭐8) - Format bytes (Uint8Array, ArrayBufferView, etc) output, useful when debugging IO functions.
  • coffee (⭐33) - Deno Configuration - a type-safe, easy to use Deno config manager.
  • computed_types (⭐362) - Joi like validators for Typescript and Deno.
  • dcc (⭐11) - Deno Cache Clean, reloading deps when next running.
  • type-fest (⭐14) - A collection of essential TypeScript types (port of sindresorhus/type-fest).
  • watch (⭐44) - A file watcher.
  • wu-diff-js (⭐18) - A diff library to compute differences between two slices using wu(the O(NP)) algorithm.

Modules / Web framework

  • aqua (⭐217) - A minimal and fast web framework for Deno.
  • drash (⭐1.1k) - A REST microframework for Deno's HTTP server with zero dependencies.
  • opine (⭐853) - Fast, minimalist web framework ported from ExpressJS.
    • opine-http-proxy (⭐16) - Proxy middleware for Deno Opine HTTP servers.

Modules / WebSocket

  • dropper (⭐27) - Custom event-based WebSockets framework for building real-time apps on Deno 🦕
  • websocket_server (⭐10) - A WebSocket server library.

Modules / Web utils

  • compression (⭐38) - Deno HTTP compression middleware.
  • djwt (⭐233) - Make JSON Web Tokens (JWT) on Deno based on JWT and JWS specifications.
  • forwarded (⭐9) - Deno port of forwarded library.
  • gentleRpc (⭐45) - A JSON-RPC 2.0 TypeScript library for Deno and the browser.
  • gql (⭐198) - Universal GraphQL HTTP middleware.
  • nats (⭐174) - A Deno client for the NATS messaging system.
  • obsidian (⭐760) - A native GraphQL caching client and server module.
  • qs (⭐5) - A query string parser with nesting support.
  • router (⭐55) - A high-performance basic router works anywhere.

Modules / Webview

  • webview (⭐1.5k) - Deno bindings for webview, a tiny library for creating web-based desktop GUIs.

Modules / XML

  • deno-xml-parser (⭐22) - Deno XML parser ported from segmentio/xml-parser.
  • sax-ts (⭐20) - SAX-style XML parser ported from sax-js (⭐1.1k).

Registries / XML

  • deno.land/x/ - The official 3rd party module registry.

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 18, 2020
entry.content:
Modules / Utils

  • deno-context (⭐6) - Propagate deadlines, a cancellation and other request-scoped values to multiple promise. The behaviour is like Go's context.
  • invert-kv (⭐3) - Invert key-value pairs in Deno.
  • online (⭐7) - Check if you're currently online in Deno.
  • qrcode (⭐45) - QR code image generator for Deno.
  • recursive-readdir (⭐8) - Recursively read directories in Deno.

Modules / Web utils

  • status (⭐15) - HTTP codes and status utility for Deno.
  • up (⭐14) - Check if a website is up in Deno.

Tools / XML

  • dedep (⭐66) - Manage dependency versions.
  • packer-provisioner-deno (⭐5) - A Packer plugin that makes it easy to build virtual machine images with Deno scripts.
  • starter (⭐28) - Deno module starter template with GitHub Actions CI

entry.title: Awesome Deno Updates on May 14, 2020
entry.content:
Modules / CLI utils

  • cli-spinner (⭐59) - Show spinners in the terminal while running long tasks.

Modules / Template engine

  • dejs (⭐147) - Ejs template engine for deno.

Modules / Utils

  • deno-dotenv
    • pietvanzoen/deno-dotenv (⭐148) - Dotenv handling for deno.
    • cardosomarcos/deno-dotenv (⭐8) - Loads environment variables from .env for Deno projects.
  • deno-plugin-prepare (⭐47) - A library for managing Deno native plugin dependencies.
  • ms (⭐17) - Easily convert various time formats to milliseconds.

Tools / XML

  • clone (⭐4) - A simple utility for the convenient clone.
  • denoinit (⭐31) - Denoinit generates useful files for Deno project.
  • denoversion (⭐7) - SemVer and git version management for Deno.
  • udd (⭐331) - Update Deno dependencies: updates import statements to their latest published version.

Articles / XML

  • What's Deno, and how is it different from Node.js?
  • Deno on Cloud Run
